domain.description: Pure business logic for meeting roles and cost calculation.
domain.notes: Keep business rules centralized here; avoid duplicating cost math in UI components. Add domain tests under tests/lib.

state.description: React state hooks bridging domain logic to the UI.
state.notes: Extend hooks instead of embedding ad-hoc state inside components.

ui.description: Presentational components and layout for the meeting timer experience.
ui.notes: Consume state from hooks and domain utilities; avoid re-implementing logic in components.

tests.description: Vitest suites covering domain and UI behaviors.
tests.notes: Add or update tests alongside code changes to keep coverage aligned with business rules.

docs.description: Human-oriented documentation for architecture, domain modeling, testing, and AI collaboration.
docs.notes: Review docs before larger refactors to stay aligned with conventions.

config.description: Tooling and project configuration for Next.js, linting, and styling.
config.notes: Ensure new scripts or tooling align with existing config.
